name: Christopher W. Evans
description: My name is Chris Evans. Currently, I live in Portland Maine and work at Tilson Technology. I went to Highschool at the Maine School for Science and Math. Now I am finishing up a gap year as a fulltime GIS Technician before moving onto a  Computer Science degree at UMass Amherst. During the summer I will be taking a break to continue to pursue my interests in bowling, software development, and painting.
